title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI - Honduras - Ramon Villeda Morales International Airport (MHLM)
description:
In this video we will land at Ramon Villeda Morales International Airport (MHLM). RamÃ³n Villeda Morales International Airport (Spanish: Aeropuerto Internacional RamÃ³n Villeda Morales) (IATA: SAP, ICAO: MHLM), also known as La Mesa International Airport, is located 11 kilometres (7 mi) southeast of the city of San Pedro Sula, in the CortÃ©s Department of Honduras.

The airport is named after RamÃ³n Villeda Morales (1909â€“1971), who served as President of Honduras from 1957 to 1963. It is the major and busiest airport in Honduras, handling about 1,022,924 passengers in 2018. The airport also handles about 150 flights internationally and domestically. The airport provides short connections to tourist attractions such as La Ceiba, and the Caribbean beaches of RoatÃ¡n and Tela.
